text: The Flag of Sindh is the flag of the Province of Sindh within Pakistan. The Sindh provincial flag is green and shows the provincial emblem in the centre which includes the major crops of this desert fertile province; cotton, rice, wheat and sugar cane. The inscription below in a crescent scroll reads Government of Sindh in both Urdu and Sindhi, respectively. The flag uses the Pakistani national colours, white and dark green, colors that reflect the Islamic heritage of Pakistan. ==Other websites== * Flag of Pakistan (Federal) * Sindh emblem == References == Category:Sindh Sindh Sindh
title: Flag of Sindh
